name: graphster (wisecubeai)
description: [项目级] spark-based library that helps construct and query knowledge graphs from unstructured and structured data。来源: https://github.com/wisecubeai/graphster

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
spark-based library that helps construct and query knowledge graphs from unstructured and structured data

来源: https://github.com/wisecubeai/graphster
语言: Scala
Stars: 104

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content: git clone https://github.com/wisecubeai/graphster.git

name: graphster/core 模块
description: [模块级] graphster 项目的 core 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/wisecubeai/graphster

genes.title: core 模块说明
genes.content:
The core module contains two main parts. The first is the configuration, 
and the second part is for processing structured data into graphs.

name: graphster/datasets 模块
description: [模块级] graphster 项目的 datasets 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/wisecubeai/graphster

genes.title: datasets 模块说明
genes.content:
The datasets module contains code for general RDF format parsing. 
It also contains code for setting up common datasets.

Currently, we have code for the following datasets.

- MeSH
- Clinical Trials

name: graphster/query 模块
description: [模块级] graphster 项目的 query 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/wisecubeai/graphster

genes.title: query 模块说明
genes.content:
The query module is a wrapper around the Bellman project from GSK. 
At the moment, graphs of with more than 25 million edges will be slow.

name: graphster/text 模块
description: [模块级] graphster 项目的 text 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/wisecubeai/graphster

genes.title: text 模块说明
genes.content:
In order to add text into a graph, we must extract the information we are interested into a structured format. This is 
where NLP comes in. This library is not an NLP library, which is why there is an abstraction layer. The idea is that 
the information is extracted into a structured form, so that the downstream process does not need to know what engine 
was used for NLP.

The minimal requirement for an NLP library to serve as an engine is named entity recognition. However, supporting 
syntactic
